oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dual-feed gap-coupled square microstrip antennas for broadband circular polarization
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: REDDY, KTV
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: microstrip antenna
circular polarization
broadband antennas
dual-feed antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several gap-coupled square microstrip antennas (SMSAs) have been proposed to yield broadband circular polarization with moderate gain for two different substrates. Only one patch is fed at two orthogonal points with equal amplitude and 90 degrees phase difference, and the other square MSAs tone, two or four, respectively) are parasitically coupled.
